page.title: 07HIGH TECHNOLOGY INDUSTRY
page.content: VARIOUS DEFINITIONS OF{HIGH TECHNOLOGY EXIST. HERE, REFERENCE IS MADE TO FIRMS WHICH DESIGN OR PRODUCE {INNOVATIVE OR ADVANCED}PRODUCTS. THESE INDUSTRIES PROVIDE JOB GROWTH POTENTIAL DURING TIMES OF HIGH UNEMPLOYMENT NATIONALLY. SOUTH HAMPSHIRE HAS ATTRACTED SUCH INDUSTRIES.{CHILWORTH MANOR}IS OWNED BY THE UNIVERSITY OF SOUTHAMPTON. THE ESTATE COVERS 11 HECTARES OF GRID SQUARE 0440 0118. OUTLINE PLANNING PERMISSION HAS BEEN GIVEN TO DEVELOP THE FIRST PHASE OF 3 HECTARES. NEW BUILDINGS ARE CURRENTLY UNDER CONSTRUCTION. IT IS PROPOSED TO CATER FOR FIRMS WHICH NEED CONTACT WITH THE UNIVERSITY OF SOUTHAMPTON. IT IS LOCATED IN A RURAL PART OF THE STUDY AREA.
